list.abs: by analyzing the experiences in introducing and rearing saiga from abroad and the saiga keeping in foreign zoo , the cause leading to the death of saiga mainly results from the reaction symptomatology .摘要从国内数次引种饲养实践及国外动物园饲养情况分析，赛加羚羊人工饲养成活率较低的主要原因为应激综合症。

methods \ Serum ILand IL _ 6 were examined in 48 BMS patients by means of ELISA . the Hamilton Depression Rating Scale ( HDRS ) was used to evaluate the depressive symptomatology .方法采用酶联免疫吸附测定法（ELISA)检测48例BMS患者血清ILIL_6的浓度，并采用汉密顿抑郁量表评定患者的抑郁症状。
